scopes.identity.readonly: See your personal information, such as your first name, last name, and favorite station.
scopes.identity.write: Update your personal information, such as your favorite station(s) or program(s) you follow, on your behalf.
scopes.listening.readonly: See your NPR One listening history and get audio recommendations.
scopes.listening.write: Record that you have heard, marked as interesting, and/or skipped NPR One stories in order to personalize future audio recommendations.
scopes.localactivation: Connect you with your local NPR member station for communication purposes.

apiDescription: The entry point to user-specific information
